1.name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
1.description: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

2.name: The Wild Bunch
2.description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

3.name: Midnight Cowboy
3.description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

4.name: Easy Rider
4.description: Through the open country and desert lands, two bikers head from L.A to New Orleans, and along the way, meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap they are unaware of.

5.name: Age of Consent
5.description: An elderly artist thinks he has become too stale and is past his prime. His friend (and agent) persuades him to go to an off-shore island to try once more. On the island he rediscovers his ...                See full summary »

6.name: True Grit
6.description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.

7.name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
7.description: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

8.name: The Italian Job
8.description: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

9.name: Hello, Dolly!
9.description: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

10.name: The Extraordinary Seaman
10.description: Lt. Commander Finchhaven, a ghostly relic from the First World War, he had fallen down dead drunk on his first assignment and been consigned from the great beyond to sail the seas until a ...                See full summary »

11.name: Paint Your Wagon
11.description: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

12.name: The Bridge at Remagen
12.description: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?

13.name: Marooned
13.description: Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?

14.name: Cactus Flower
14.description: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

15.name: La piscine
15.description: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

16.name: Support Your Local Sheriff!
16.description: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

17.name: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
17.description: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in an inhumanely grueling dance marathon.

18.name: Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice
18.description: Documentary-filmmaker Bob Sanders and his wife Carol attend a group-therapy session that serves as the backdrop for the film's opening scenes. Returning to their Los Angeles home, the newly...                See full summary »

19.name: Women in Love
19.description: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

20.name: Battle of Britain
20.description: In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.

21.name: Fellini - Satyricon
21.description: A series of disjointed mythical tales set in first century Rome.

22.name: Kes
22.description: A young, English working-class boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet falcon.

23.name: La caduta degli dei (Götterdämmerung)
23.description: The dramatic collapse of a wealthy, industrialist/Junker family during the reign of the Third Reich.

24.name: Z
24.description: Following the murder of a prominent leftist, an investigator tries to uncover the truth while government officials attempt to cover up their roles.

25.name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
25.description: A headstrong young teacher in a private school in 1930s Edinburgh ignores the curriculum and influences her impressionable 12 year old charges with her over-romanticized world view.

26.name: The Gay Deceivers
26.description: Danny and Elliot avoid military service by pretending to be gay, but they have to act the part when the recruiting officer doesn't buy it.

27.name: The Undefeated
27.description: After the Civil War, ex-Confederate soldiers heading for a new life in Mexico run into ex-Union cavalrymen selling horses to the Mexican government but they must join forces to fight off Mexican bandits and revolutionaries.

28.name: Pippi Långstrump
28.description: Pippi Longstocking, a super-strong redheaded little girl, moves into her father's cottage Villa Villekulla, and has adventures with her next-door neighbors Tommy and Annika in this compilation film of the classic Swedish TV series.

29.name: Sweet Charity
29.description: Taxi dancer Charity continues to have Faith in the human race despite apparently endless disappointments at its hands, and Hope that she will finally meet the nice young man to romance her ...                See full summary »

30.name: The Magic Christian
30.description: Sir Guy Grand, the richest man in the world, adopts a homeless boy, Youngman. Together, they set out to prove that anyone, and anything, can be bought with money.

31.name: Mackenna's Gold
31.description: A bandit kidnaps a Marshal who has seen a map showing a gold vein on Indian lands, but other groups are looking for it too, while the Apache try to keep the secret location undisturbed.

32.name: Marquis de Sade: Justine
32.description: Without a family, penniless and separated from her sister, a beautiful chaste woman will have to cope with an endless parade of villains, perverts and degenerates who will claim not only her treasured virtue but also her life.

33.name: Topaz
33.description: A French Intelligence Agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first with uncovering the events leading up to the 1962 Cuban Missile Crisis, and then back to France to break up an international Russian spy ring.

34.name: Anne of the Thousand Days
34.description: Henry VIII of England discards one wife, Katharine of Aragon, who has failed to produce a male heir, in favor of the young and beautiful Anne Boleyn.

35.name: Sayat Nova
35.description: A super-stylized, surreal biography of Armenian troubadour Sayat Nova, whose life is depicted through non-narrative amalgamations of poetic images.

36.name: Tell Them Willie Boy Is Here
36.description: In 1909, when young Paiute Indian Willie Boy returns to his California reservation to be with Lola, whose father disapproves of him, a killing in self defense takes place, triggering a massive man hunt for Willie.

37.name: Ma nuit chez Maud
37.description: The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

38.name: The Wrecking Crew
38.description: The count has stolen enough gold to cause a financial crisis in the world markets so I.C.E. sends in ace spy Matt Helm to stop him. As Matt works alone, the British send in Freya to aid ...                See full summary »

39.name: The Army of Shadows
39.description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

40.name: Macunaíma
40.description: Our story begins with Macunaima's miraculous birth to an old woman in a tiny jungle settlement. Born full grown, he discovers his life's purpose which leads him and his family/followers on ...                See full summary »

41.name: More
41.description: Stefan, a recent college graduate, hitchhikes from Germany to Paris where he meets American expatriate, Estelle. They chase the sun to Ibiza. An idyllic island life degenerates when she introduces him to heroin and they get addicted.

42.name: The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes
42.description: At Medfield College, an accident with a donated computer gives Dexter Riley the ability to remember any knowledge learned instantly and perfectly.

43.name: Carry on Camping
43.description: Sid and Bernie keep having their amorous intentions snubbed by their girlfriends Joan and Anthea. The boys suggest a camping holiday, secretly intending to take them to a nudist camp. Of ...                See full summary »

44.name: Charro!
44.description: Vince Hackett's gang steals a prized victory canon from Mexico and blames the deed on ex-gang member Jess Wade who wants to go straight.

45.name: Play Dirty
45.description: During the Desert War in North Africa, a group of British commandos disguised in Italian soldiers must travel behind enemy lines and destroy a vital Nazi oil depot.

46.name: Sam Whiskey
46.description: A widow hires an ex-gambler to retrieve gold bars from a sunken river boat in Colorado and discreetly return them to the Federal Mint, from where they had been stolen by her dead husband.

47.name: The Arrangement
47.description: A suicidal advertising executive is forced to re-evaluate his life while dealing with his unhappy marriage, his mistress, and his aging father.

48.name: John and Mary
48.description: John and Mary meet in a singles bar, sleep together, and spend the next day getting to know each other.

49.name: 100 Rifles
49.description: In 1912 Sonora, Mexico, native revolutionary Yaqui Joe robs a bank to buy arms for his oppressed people, but finds himself sought by an American lawman and the Mexican Army.

50.name: Una sull'altra
50.description: An unscrupulous doctor is accused of murdering his asthmatic wife as part of an insurance scam, despite her apparent reemergence as a high-class stripper.
